trans-unit.source: Specifies the resource consumed by the member of a class.
trans-unit.target: Angir ressursen forbrukes av medlem av en klasse.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: If the ResourceConsumptionAttribute attribute is applied to a member, the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute> attribute must also be applied.
trans-unit.target: Hvis attributtet ResourceConsumptionAttribute brukes til et medlem av <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute>attributtet må også brukes.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute>

trans-unit.source: If the resource scope of the consumed resource is different than the resource scope of how it is consumed, the constructor that takes a `consumptionScope` parameter should be used to specify how the resource is consumed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ressursen omfanget brukte ressursen er forskjellig fra omfanget ressursen hvordan den forbrukes, konstruktøren som tar en `consumptionScope` parameteren skal brukes til å angi hvordan ressursen forbrukes.

trans-unit.source: For example, a resource may be exposed as a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> resource, but only used at the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> and <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> scope.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en ressurs kan vises som en <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>ressursen, men brukes bare på den <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>og <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>omfanget.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>

trans-unit.source: For this example the `consumptionScope` parameter is set to <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> | <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den `consumptionScope` parameteren er satt til <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>| <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope></xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>

trans-unit.source: The `resourceScope` parameter in the constructor must specify a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> greater than or equal to the resource exposure of all called members.
trans-unit.target: Den `resourceScope` parameter i konstruktøren må angi en <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>større enn eller lik ressursen eksponering av alle kall medlemmer.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>

trans-unit.source: For example, a method consuming two <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> resources and one <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> resource would be identified as consuming a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> and a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> resource by setting `resourceScope` to <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> | <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en metode som bruker to <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>ressurser og en <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>ressurs vil være identifisert som bruker en <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>og <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>ressurs ved å angi `resourceScope` til <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>| <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope></xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope></xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope></xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope></xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope></xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>

trans-unit.source: `Public` members cannot expose <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> or <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> resources.
trans-unit.target: `Public`Medlemmer kan ikke vise <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>eller <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>ressurser.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> members cannot expose <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>Medlemmer kan ikke vise <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>ressurser.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope></xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>

trans-unit.source: The graph of methods terminates when a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute> attribute with a resource scope of <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> is applied to a method.
trans-unit.target: Diagrammet av metoder avslutter når en <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute>attributt med en ressurs LISENSENS <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>brukes på en metode.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute"></xref> class specifying the scope of the consumed resource.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute"> </xref> klassen angir omfanget brukte ressursen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"></xref> for the consumed resource.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"> </xref> for brukte ressursen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute"></xref> class specifying the scope of the consumed resource and the scope of how it is consumed.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute"> </xref> klassen å angi omfanget av brukte ressursen og omfanget av hvordan den er brukt.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute> attribute specifies a scope of <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>, then the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute> attribute must specify a resource it consumes and how it consumes it, by specifying a value for the `consumptionScope` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute>attributtet angir et omfang for <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>, vil <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute>attributtet må angi en ressurs den bruker og hvordan den bruker den, ved å angi en verdi for den `consumptionScope` parameteren.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The scope specified by `consumptionScope` should be less than or equal to the scope specified by `resourceScope`.
trans-unit.target: Det angitte av området `consumptionScope` må være mindre enn eller lik omfanget som er angitt av `resourceScope`.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> scope can be consumed as a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> or <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> scope, but not as a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> scope.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>omfanget kan brukes som en <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>eller <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>omfang, men ikke som en <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>omfanget.</xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> </xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"></xref> for the consumed resource.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"> </xref> for brukte ressursen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"></xref> used by this member.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"> </xref> brukes av dette medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the consumption scope for this member.
trans-unit.target: Henter forbruk omfanget for dette medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"></xref> object specifying the resource scope used by this member.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"> </xref> -objekt som angir ressursen omfanget som brukes av dette medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the resource scope for the consumed resource.
trans-unit.target: Henter ressursen omfanget for den brukte ressursen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"></xref> object specifying the resource scope of the consumed member.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope"> </xref> -objekt som angir ressursen omfanget brukte medlemmet.
